RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 250 Y Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SR AMOR SECRETO kept to task. TAKE OFF TIME bobbled, late run. SMOKESTACK out finished. TTT LA ROLEX out kicked. HEZA POLITICALDASH dueled thru out. LENAS LONG NIGHT drifted in, dueled all the way. PK RIPS CANDY bobbled, pinched, alter path.

ENTRY.NAME: Lenas Long Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, dueled all the way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 110 Y Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 3500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IGOT SUMTING SPECIAL broke in, drifted out. RAPID CARTEL CANDY out nodded. ONE FAMOUS AMOS in tight late. GO LITTLE VICK CASH good try. TF EYE OPENING JESS one paced. FABULOUS MAMIE broke in, foe crossed path.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: S G Flores & T C Bartlett

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 300 Y Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TTT LA KAS broke in, late surge. RALLY ACTRESS forced out, closed fast. MARIA GAMBRELLI out kicked. MARLA CARTEL ANGEL drifted in, game 4th. JESS TRAIN B broke out, solid effort. TEMPTING GETAWAY in mix, weakened. MS DELUXE off step slow. TF BLUEAWAY EAGLE outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Marla Cartel Angel
ENTRY.OWNER: Valles Norma A and Cano Santiago

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 250 Y Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 4300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST PLAIN DEADLY popped, held on. OPEN BAR MC best of others. BJS THE TOUGHEST GUY strong finish. MAG E MAY broke out, bumped. POOL ZONE bobbled start, bumped. PERRY SPECIAL CHICK brushed, no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Open Bar Mc
ENTRY.OWNER: Maltos Isidro D and Olmeda Salvador

ENTRY.NAME: Pool Zone
ENTRY.OWNER: Sanchez III Noe Rolando Chapa Adolfo and Camarillo Bulmaro

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 300 Y Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERRYSMIDNIGHTCARTER broke in, late effort. EAGLES FLY WEST out kicked. BABY PILOT closed well. FLYING FEATHER broke in, game try. IM FOR MYLES mid pack duel. MATILLDA broke in, mid pack duel. AREASONFORACOCKTAIL bumped both sides, veered in. TTT MAXED OUT JAMES broke out, bumped, veered in.

ENTRY.NAME: Areasonforacocktail
ENTRY.OWNER: Mapes, Jr., Charles S. and Mapes, Jessie R.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 250 Y Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SENIOR SAN LOROBO hopped start, bumped, late run. CHOOCHU early duel, held 2nd. NBC MR CHRIS 4 in a row. MR K B DAY early duel, out kicked. JRS TAYLORS MAJESTIC drifted in, game effort. EAT LUNAR DUST mid pack duel. JSM FAST DASH mid pack duel. JJ JESS GOES BY bumped, no impact. RH QUESITO FLASH pinched back. STOLE THE PRIZE lost contact.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 220 Y Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 7500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAJESTIC BUSINESS speed, held. TIPPY THE TRAIN second best. BJX SUPERNATURAL broke out, bumped, game try. TM COAL TRAIN no menace. LOCOMOTIVE improved position. IM THAT PERRY one paced. ONE SWEET JAX hopped start, bumped. RRREGULATOR broke out, no factor.
